article_title: Canada faces lawsuit over military exports to Israel

sentence: More  than  30,500  Palestinians  -  mostly  women  and  children  -  have  been  killed  during  Israel's  retaliatory  offensive,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry  in  Gaza.
